headline: Assistant Chief Counsel, U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement, Department of Homeland Security
summary: Experienced attorney with a demonstrated history of working in law enforcement.  Skilled in Immigration Law, Legal Research, and Legal Writing.  Strong consulting professional graduated from Santa Clara University School of Law.

defaultPosition.title: Office of the Principal Legal Advisor

positions.title: Office of the Principal Legal Advisor

positions.description: Advise agency clients on legal sufficiency of enforcement operations and labor/employment decisions, provide litigation support to U.S. Attorney's Offices in civil forfeiture and employment discrimination cases, represent management in cases before the EEOC, MSPB, and arbitrators, and train uniformed employees in search and seizure, disclosure, and immigration law.
positions.title: Office of Chief Counsel

positions.companyName: CALIFORNIA SUPERIOR COURT, COUNTY OF SANTA CLARA
positions.description: Conducted legal research, prepared bench memos, orders, and opinions, communicated with counsel regarding case management and procedural requirements, reviewed court files and motions.
positions.title: Judicial Law Clerk

positions.companyName: OFFICE OF THE DISTRICT ATTORNEY, COUNTY OF SAN MATEO
positions.description: Represented the People in court on multiple occasions under supervision of a Deputy District Attorney, drafted motions, performed legal research, and prepared memoranda on complex criminal prosecution issues.
